skills.name: Refactoring Definition
skills.pattern: Change structure without changing behavior, improve maintainability

skills.name: When to Refactor
skills.pattern: Code smells, before adding features, during code review

skills.name: Safe Refactoring
skills.pattern: Tests first, small steps, commit often, use IDE tools

skills.name: Extract Method
skills.pattern: Long method -> extract logically related lines into new function

skills.name: Extract Variable
skills.pattern: Complex expression -> const descriptiveName = expression;

skills.name: Extract Class
skills.pattern: Large class -> split related fields/methods into new class

skills.name: Extract Interface
skills.pattern: Similar classes -> extract shared interface

skills.name: Inline Method
skills.pattern: Trivial method -> inline body at call sites

skills.name: Inline Variable
skills.pattern: Variable used once -> inline the expression

skills.name: Move Method
skills.pattern: Method uses other class more -> move to that class

skills.name: Move Field
skills.pattern: Field used by other class more -> move to that class

skills.name: Rename
skills.pattern: Unclear name -> descriptive, intention-revealing name

skills.name: Rename to Reveal Intent
skills.pattern: calculateValue() -> calculateDiscountedPrice()

skills.name: Replace Conditional with Polymorphism
skills.pattern: switch/if-else on type -> subclass per type, override method

skills.name: Decompose Conditional
skills.pattern: Complex if -> extract condition and branches to methods

skills.name: Consolidate Conditionals
skills.pattern: Multiple ifs returning same -> combine with OR/AND

skills.name: Replace Nested Conditional with Guard Clauses
skills.pattern: Nested ifs -> early returns for edge cases

skills.name: Remove Dead Code
skills.pattern: Unreachable or unused code -> delete it

skills.name: Split Loop
skills.pattern: Loop doing multiple things -> separate loops (may combine after)

skills.name: Replace Loop with Pipeline
skills.pattern: for loop -> map/filter/reduce chain

skills.name: Introduce Parameter Object
skills.pattern: Many related params -> single object parameter

skills.name: Preserve Whole Object
skills.pattern: Pass object instead of extracting multiple values

skills.name: Encapsulate Field
skills.pattern: Public field -> private + getter/setter

skills.name: Encapsulate Collection
skills.pattern: Return copy or immutable view, not raw collection

skills.name: Replace Primitive with Object
skills.pattern: string phoneNumber -> class PhoneNumber

skills.name: Pull Up Method
skills.pattern: Duplicate in subclasses -> move to parent

skills.name: Push Down Method
skills.pattern: Method only used by one subclass -> move down

skills.name: Replace Inheritance with Composition
skills.pattern: IS-A relationship weak -> use HAS-A instead

skills.name: Separate Query from Modifier
skills.pattern: Method that returns and modifies -> split into two

skills.name: Parameterize Method
skills.pattern: Similar methods -> one method with parameter
